sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip' import { deleteEmployee } from '../../../actions/employees' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container' import Divider from '@material-ui/core/Divider' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import AccountCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AccountCircleTwoTone' import useStyles from './styles' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const EmployeeCard = ({employee, edit}) => { const classes = useStyles() const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false) const [editMode, setEditMode] = useState(edit) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleEditMode = () => { setIsFlipped(false) setEditMode((prev) => !prev) } return ( {employee.firstName} {employee.lastName} {employee.positions.map((position)=> {position} )}
{employee.phoneNumber}
{employee.email}
) } export default EmployeeCard
